chapter.title: Database Setup
chapter.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &THIS.APPLICATION; stores messages using Cassandra database. The database is used for storing unsent messages, messages successfully sent and messages that failed to be sent. You must have Cassandra database (version 1.2 or higher) installed. We recommend that you use the latest version (1.2.6 is the most recent version yet).

To install the Cassandra database, look for distributives at the offical Apache website here . We recommend that you download the latest binaries and install the database following the instructions specified in the Apache documentation in their website .
